pytket._circuit.OpType¶

Enum for available operations compatible with the \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit class.

class pytket._circuit.OpType¶

Enum for available operations compatible with \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit s.

Members:

Z : Pauli \(Z\)

X : Pauli \(X\)

Y : Pauli \(Y\)

S : \(S\) := \(Rz(\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2})\)

Sdg : \(S^{\dagger}\) := \(Rz(-\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2})\)

T : \(T\) := \(Rz(\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{4})\)

Tdg : \(T^{\dagger}\) := \(Rz(-\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{4})\)

V : \(V\) := \(Rx(\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2})\)

Vdg : \(V^{\dagger}\) := \(Rx(-\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2})\)

H : \(H\) := Hadamard gate

Rx : \(Rx(\alpha)\) := \(e^{- \frac{i\alpha X}{2}}\)

Ry : \(Ry(\alpha)\) := \(e^{- \frac{i\alpha Y}{2}}\)

Rz : \(Rz(\alpha)\) := \(e^{- \frac{i\alpha Z}{2}}\)

U1 : \(U1(\lambda)\) := \(Rz(\lambda)\), up to global phase. U-gates are used by IBM. See https://github.com/Qiskit/qiskit-tutorials/blob/master/qiskit/terra/summary_of_quantum_operations.ipynb for more information on U-gates.

U2 : \(U2(\phi, \lambda)\) := \(Rz(\phi)Ry(\frac{\mathrm{\pi}}{2})Rz(\lambda)\), defined by matrix multiplication, up to global phase.

U3 : \(U3(\theta, \phi, \lambda)\) := \(U1(\phi)Ry(\theta)U1(\lambda)\), up to global phase.

CX : \(CX\) := Controlled \(X\) gate

CY : \(CY\) := Controlled \(Y\) gate

CZ : \(CZ\) := Controlled \(Z\) gate

CH : \(CH\) := Controlled \(H\) gate

CRz : \(CRz(\alpha)\) := Controlled \(Rz(\alpha)\) gate

CU1 : \(CU1(\lambda)\) := Controlled \(U1(\lambda)\) gate. Note that this is not equivalent to a \(CRz(\lambda)\) up to global phase - there is a correction required on the control qubit.

CU3 : \(CU3(\theta, \phi, \lambda)\) := Controlled \(U3(\theta, \phi, \lambda)\) gate. Similar rules apply.

CCX : \(CCX\) := Toffoli gate

SWAP : \(SWAP\) := swap two qubits

CSWAP : \(CSWAP\) := Controlled swap gate

Input : Not for end users

Output : Not for end users

noop : Identity gate. These gates are not permanent and are automatically stripped by the compiler.

Measure : \(Measure\) := Z-basis projective measurement. Support for more complicated measurement types and classical registers is coming soon.

Box : \(Box\) := Represents an arbitrary subcircuit within the Circuit object. Not for end users.

ISWAP : \(ISWAP(\alpha)\) := \(e^{\frac{i\pi \alpha}{4} (X \otimes X + Y \otimes Y)}\). Used by Cirq.

XXPhase : \(XXPhase(\alpha)\) := \(e^{- \frac{i \pi \alpha}{2} (X \otimes X)}\). Used by Cirq.

YYPhase : \(YYPhase(\alpha)\) := \(e^{- \frac{i \pi \alpha}{2} (Y \otimes Y)}\). Used by Cirq.

ZZPhase : \(ZZPhase(\alpha)\) := \(e^{- \frac{i \pi \alpha}{2} (Z \otimes Z)}\). Used by Cirq.

PhasedX : \(PhasedX(\alpha,\beta)\) := \(Rz(\alpha)Rx(\beta)Rz(-\alpha)\). Used by Cirq.

CnRy : \(CnRy(\alpha)\) := n-controlled \(Ry(\alpha)\) gate.

CnX : \(CnX\) := n-controlled \(X\) gate.

name¶

(self: handle) -> str
